name: Deploy to GitHub Pages

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main  # ou a branch que você usa

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      # Se precisar instalar Node (React, Vite)
      - name: Setup Node
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '22'  # use a versão adequada

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install

      - name: Build project
        run: npm run build  # ou o comando de build do seu projeto

      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v6
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: ./dist  # pasta que contém os arquivos finais (build do Vite/React)
